basics.name: Shu-Ling Chang
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: A software development expert with 4+ years of experience in IT services. A collaborative and independent engineer with experience in  API development, web development and programming teaching. An enthusiastic programmer who taught herself to program in PHP, Golang, SQL, Python, JavaScript, and other languages. She's someone who thrives solving problems.

work.name: HLW Tech
work.summary: HLW Tech is a China-based game services firm with ~60+ employees. Its markets are in Southeast Asia.

highlights.title: Programming in PHP and Golang
highlights.content: Develops 4 Golang projects and a PHP project. Uses several skills, including  Go, PHP, MySQL, Redis, RPC, JavaScript, HTML, Docker, etc.

contents.name: Game server systems
contents.description: These systems provide APIs for Cocos front-end fishing casino game.

contents.name: Stress testing system
contents.description: Perform stress testing for game server systems.

contents.name: PHP backstage & APIs system
contents.description: This system helps customer services (CS) to add, delete, update and search data, including members, betting orders, game settings, statistical reports, etc.

highlights.title: Teamwork and Cross-functional Communication
highlights.content: Uses git flows, merge request and code review to collaborate with 2 Golang partners and communicate cross-functionally with front-end teams and quality assurance (QA) teams.

work.name: LCC Net
work.summary: LCC Net is a Taiwan-based professional skilled teaching firm with ~300+ employees.

highlights.title: Python
highlights.content: Taught basic syntax, web crawler, web development (Django - Basic), data analysis with pandas and numpy.

highlights.title: MySQL
highlights.content: Taught CRUD, join, groupby, sub query, etc.

work.name: Feng Chia University
work.summary: Feng Chia University is a Taiwan University.

highlights.title: MySQL
highlights.content: Taught CRUD, join, groupby, sub query, etc.

work.name: Vangood Tech
work.summary: Vangood Tech is a Taiwan-based game services firm with ~1000+ employees.

highlights.title: Programming in PHP and Golang
highlights.content: Developed 2 golang projects and a PHP project. Used several skills, including Go, PHP (Laravel), MySQL, Redis, etc.

contents.name: Game activity system
contents.description: Used PHP with Laravel framework to build RESTful APIs efficiently. Refactored and optimized old codes and SQL queries. collaborated with 2 partners and front-end teams.

contents.name: Platform API system
contents.description: Developed APIs by using Golang with Gin, Gorm, etc. This system provides APIs for a front-end web platform and helps game agencies to CRUD or analyze data, including members, game activities, reports, etc.

contents.name: Data synchronization system
contents.description: Used Golang to build a task scheduler system independently,  reorganize data and import to another team’s database every 15 minutes. Through telegram APIs to notify the synchronized results.

work.name: MegaLive
work.summary: MegaLive is a Taiwan-based IT services firm with ~30+ employees.

highlights.title: Programming in PHP (Laravel)
highlights.content: Developed a huge Laravel project with the structure of Controller - Service - Repository - Model. Dealt with the amount of TB data in MySQL.

contents.name: Platform API system
contents.description: Used Laravel to integrate different casino games across companies, helping other teams use APIs in the same specification.

contents.name: Web backstage system
contents.description: Used Laravel with Bootstrap and JQuery to build a backstage system which helped operation engineers (Ops) solve problems from customer services (CS).

highlights.title: Teamwork and Cross-functional Communication
highlights.content: Used git flows, merge requests and code review to collaborate with 3 partners.

projects.summary: Built a website which included frontstage and backstage in Laravel framework (PHP), MySQL and Bootstrap.
Built a website which included frontstage and backstage in Laravel framework (PHP), MySQL and Bootstrap.

Built a website in Laravel framework (PHP), MySQL, Bootstrap and Vue.js. This system helps global members to sign up for lectures via online forms and check in by scanning a QR code. The firm can send notification emails to members, check the attendance rate and area ranking by reports.
Built a shopping website which included frontstage and backstage in Laravel framework (PHP), MySQL, HTML, SCSS, and JQuery.

education.institution: National Kaohsiung University of Science and Technology
education.specialization: Bachelor of Marketing, minors in English.
